title: Local
description: Born and raised in Shreveport-Bossier City, all of our mechanics live and play in S-BC. We are proud to serve this area and join the many local businesses that make our cities great.

title: Reliable
description: WWe love what we do, and we treat each customer like family. We ensure the highest quality and trustworthy service for each person who walks through our door.

title: Affordable
description: We know how difficult and costly auto repairs can be, especially when you're not anticipating it. We work hard to keep our costs down so we can keep your costs as low as possible.

title: Experienced
description: Each of our mechanics has 15-25 years of hands-on experience working on a variety of engines. Well, except Danny, but he’s looking forward to assisting us with your vehicle.

title: Family Owned
description: Stacy fulfilled a lifelong dream when he started Malone’s Diesel Repair in 2018. There’s always at least one of his children or dogs helping out on any given day. Stop by to say hello!

title: Responsive
description: We know it can be stressful to drop off your vehicle for repairs. We are available by call or text anytime to answer your questions and ease your mind.
